name: SSWK: Valentine's Day Special
description:
Today, you have a date planned with your boyfriend... Will the two of you enjoy yourselves? Find out now!

This is a short, stand-alone story that takes place in an alternate universe from SSWK's main game. Also... we've hidden 6 Steam codes for SSWK within the game! Will you be lucky enough to find one of them first?

Features:

  • Dozens of dialogue options to suit your personality
  • 4 endings
  • Unlockable bonus settings and CGs with the Password Unlock feature
  • 6 never-before-seen CGs
developers: Signed and Sealed With a Kiss
